resources.string: This study is designed for people at least 18 years old who are comfortable using a Android phone and the Android Camera.
You are eligible to join the study!
Touch "NEXT" below the get started with the consent process.

We\'re sorry that you are ineligible for this research study but you may be eligible for other studies. Visit the war on Melanoma website for details. Meanwhile, you can still use the app to map and measure your moles without contributing your data. \n\n Enjoy and Happy Mapping!
This app helps you track your moles over time and participate in a research study to better understand skin health and melanoma risks.

To join this study, we will ask you to do:

 1. Consent to participate.
 2. Register with your email address.
 3. Answer questions about yourself.
 4. Take pictures and measurements of your moles over time and share your mole data with the study team.
